page.title: 09A Hereford Rector.
page.content: Mr. Collings is the only{Rector}in the City of Hereford, the other priests being{Vicars.}(Rectors collect tithes.) He has been here for 6 years. As he is a{Prebendary,}he wears a{blue {cassock,}because it is the colour of the{Virgin Mary}after whom our Cathedral is named. During his 4 years at college, he learned{Hebrew and {Greek}as the{Bible}was written in these languages. He also learned how to hold a baby for a{christening.}If the baby cries, he squeezes it in the ribs so that it can't breathe. He hands it back to the parents and when people leave they say "Isn't he good with babies!" He takes 3 services on Sunday and 1 on Wednesday. He conducts{funerals}and performs about 12{weddings}a year. In his spare time he visits the sick at home and in hospital.
